items.sentence: I think it\'s very difficult for an Englishman to imitate a real American accent.
If I\'d brushed my teeth more often when I was a kid, I\'d have better teeth now.

Tom is quite absent-minded and sometimes forgets to pick the kids up from school.
I know you probably don\'t want to go to Boston, but I\'d like you to go with us.
Would you be willing to volunteer at the animal shelter two or three days a week?
I can\'t believe that a guy like Tom was married to a woman as beautiful as Mary.
I checked and rechecked, so I don\'t think there are any mistakes on that report.
I think Mary was the prettiest girl in our class when we were in the third grade.
I imagine that Tom will eventually figure out that Mary doesn\'t really like him.
